// src/features/auth/services/authApi.js
import axios from"axios";const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:8080";const API_URL="".concat(API_BASE,"/auth");export const register=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/register"),data);export const login=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),data);
